殫悶.definition: to faint; to swoon; to lose consciousness

殫精極慮.definition: to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly; to rack one's brains; to leave no stone unturned

殫精竭慮.definition: to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly; to rack one's brains; to leave no stone unturned
